law.catch_line: Kentucky Cooperative Extension Service to administer home-based microprocessor program -- Certification by cabinet.

text.section: The Kentucky Cooperative Extension Service shall develop, implement, and administer a program to train home-based microprocessors or personnel in compliance with 21 C.F.R. sec. 114.10.
The cabinet shall evaluate and certify home-based microprocessors or personnel who have completed the pilot microprocessing program or the microprocessing program.

The certification document shall be made in triplicate, with one (1) copy given to the home-based microprocessor or personnel, one (1) copy given to the Kentucky Cooperative Extension Service, and one (1) copy given to the cabinet.
Upon completion of the program, home-based microprocessors and personnel shall be deemed to be certified and to have met the training requirements pursuant to 21 C.F.R. sec. 114.10.

law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2003.
